title: Plagiarism Detector
accomplishments: Designed system architecture and created a stateless server using Node.js, Express.js to detect and identify plagiarism between multi-file programs using efficient structural comparison techniques
Designed algorithm to detect similarities in the code that attempts to avoid detection by performing AST transformations
Developed User Interface with React by considering usability heuristic principles to selectively examine and compare similarities

title: eShopR - eCommerce Application
accomplishments: Designed scalable ecommerce application with a seller portal for inventory management and to analyze purchase trends
Created landing page builder using React allowing sellers to dynamically design web pages to present personalized stores
Integrated with AWS by calling lambda functions to process products meta data and persisted the data in S3 buckets
Implemented product search and recommendation using Elasticsearch to retrieve results 60% faster

title: eStock - Stock Market Trading Application
accomplishments: Designed a MVC architecture by reviewing various design patterns considering the use cases to model an application for Stock Market
Developed trading, portfolio creation, quote monitoring and extended hours trading features using Java and Angular
Separated critical components into microservices and deployed to AWS supporting application with different UIs

title: eFactory - Large Scale Distributed Factory Manager
accomplishments: Developed a scalable distributed client-server application for a robot factory with Primary-Backup replication protocol to improve parallelism and availability
Implemented static and dynamic load balancing techniques to efficiently distribute customer requets to different factories to facilitate High availability
Created a membership server, to allow and manage dynamic addition/removal of servers there by improving the Scalability and ensuring Fault Tolerance of the system

title: Web Crawler and eGrader
accomplishments: Designed and developed a high performance multithreaded tropical web crawler using Python to crawl pages based on the seed urls
Developed an interactive web interface using React to safely view the web pages in a sandboxed iframe and thereby to assess the revelance of page to the topic
Implemented a grader dashboard using React, HighCharts to observe various metrics, terms related to the pages and to generate pdf reports

title: University Management System
accomplishments: Designed and developed web application using Angular to facilitate various university services (attendance, results portal, workshops, events, registration, newsletter, discussion forum) for students and faculty
Researched and implemented predictive analytic models using Python to develop a performance rating system to the courses based on student surveys
Applied data-driven transformations using D3.js, jQuery, Highcharts to observe and present various reports related to student activities and reports
